thing-type.label: YRD220 Yale Real Living Touchscreen Deadbolt
thing-type.description:
Yale Real Living Touchscreen Deadbolt

Inclusion Information

To include the lock in a Z-Wave Network (taken from the installation manual:

  1. Touch the lock screen to activate
  2. Enter the master pin and press #
  3. Press 7, then #
  4. Press 1, then #

The lock will now be in inclusion mode.


Exclusion Information

To exclude the lock from a Z-Wave Network (taken from the installation manual:

  1. Touch the lock screen to activate
  2. Enter the master pin and press #
  3. Press 7, then #
  4. Press 3, then #

The lock will now be in exclusion mode.

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Audio Volume
parameter.description:
Sets the volume level of the beeps and voice prompts

Overview

1 = Silent

2 = Low

3 = High

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Auto Re-lock
parameter.description:
When enabled, the unit will automatically re-lock

Overview

0 = Off

255 = On

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Auto Re-lock
parameter.description:
When enabled, the unit will automatically re-lock

Overview

0 = Off

255 = On

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Re-lock Time
parameter.description: Time after unlocking that the device will lock

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Wrong Code Entry Limit
parameter.description: The number of invalid tries before the lock shutdowns and sends an alarm

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Language
parameter.description:
Language used by the voice prompts

Overview

1 = English

2 = Spanish

3 = French

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Shutdown Time
parameter.description: Number of times the device is locked out after the invalid retries are exceeded

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Operating Mode
parameter.description:
Sets if the unit operates normal, or disables keypad and Z-Wave lock/unlock

Overview

0 = Normal

1 = Vacation Mode (User Codes Disabled)

2 = Privacy Mode (User Codes and ZWave Codes Disabled
